description: Person carrying two burdens, jar handles for a head. Pitchfork off shoulder

features.description: What shape are the burdens? 0 = oval, 1 = circle, 2 = indeterminate
Are the burdens suspended by ropes? 0 = no, 1 = yes
Are there both arms and a yoke support? 0 = no, 1 = yes
How many tines are on the pitchfork?
